author: sky.cactus
content: You were correct in the conclusion that miners can adjust the target block size post 1559 just the same as they can adjust the block size pre 1559.  Historically, miners have (in aggregate) been very good about not adjusting the block size inappropriately, so I think there is little push to take that power away from them.  However, if we do see them inappropriately adjusting the target block size after 1559 then we can take the power away pretty easily.
